resources:
MAAMTA LW TRIAL
Hello blank fragment 8. Oral folic acid
YES NO DON`T KNOW RIGHT LEFT BOTh Unnecessary
Is LW alive? LW zinda ha
Date of death Agar LW ka intiqaal ho gaya tu us k tareekh
Time of death Intiqaal ka waqt
Is baby alive? Bacha zinda ha
Date of death Agar bachay ka intiqaal ho gaya tu us k tareekh
Time of death Intiqaal ka waqt
Age of the baby on day of visit System generated Jis din visit k ha bachay ko us din bachay k umer dinoun ma Yeh system khud fill karay ga 1
Did you give anything to drink or eat during this hour to the baby? Kya is ganty k doran apny bachay ko kuch peene ya khanay ko dia?
Total time duration, the baby was breastfed at this specific time Muqarar waqt pay bachay na kitni dair k dhood peeya
Type of spoon used Agar bachay ko chamchay sa dhood diya ha tu wo kon sa tha Tea spoon (Chai wala chamcha) Tablespoon (Chawal khanay wala chamcha) Cotton piece (Roi ka tukray sa) Dropper (Qatray peelnay walay sa)
How much amount is given (Approximate) Kitni miqdar ma dhood diya
Did the enrolled baby vomit immediately (Half an hour) after feeding? Kya bachay ko ulti tu nahi hoi dhood pilanay k foran baad
How much feed did the baby vomit? Agar bachay ko ulti hoi tu kitni dair baad hoi dhood pilanay k baad All of the feed Small amount Half of the feed
Was there any other baby (specifically ask for other siblings or children at home) who was breastfed by this enrolled LW during this specific hour? There is a chance that mother is also breastfeeding her other under-five children or other kids at home.(DO NOT INCLUDE AN ENROLLED BABY) Kya is bachay k saaath saath maa na kisi aur ko bh dhood pilaya ha jis k umer 5 saal sa kaam ho, yeh us maa and bachay k liya ha jo hamari study ma enrolled han
Number of children who were breastfed by the enrolled LW at this specific hour (DO NOT INCLUDE AN ENROLLED BABY) LW na kitnay bachoun ko dhood pilaya ha pichaly 1 ghantay ma
During this specific hour, was baby given anything which was cooked at home (A recipe) For example , Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer, EXCEPT breast milk? If same thing give more than two times, count it a one. Is khas ghantay main, kiya bachay ko ghar pe kuch paka k khanay ya peenay k liye diya giya. Jaisay k: Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer. Ager aik he cheez aik khas ghantay main aik se ziyda baar degaye hai, to usko aik ke baar ginti man laayen.
Where this recipe was made or cooked? Bachay ko khilay Janay wali cheez kahan tayar k gay th Own home (apna ghar ma) Somewhere else (ya Kahin aur)
Recipe name/description which was given to a baby during this specific hour? Us cheez ka naam jo paka k dee gaye
Code of the recipe used Uss cheez ka code jo paka k dee gaye
Portion size description Kis cheez se wo cheez khilaye ya pilaaye gaye
Amount used in gram Kitni Mikqaar main de gaye
During this specific hour, was baby given any other thing which was cooked at home (A recipe) For example , Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer, EXCEPT breast milk? If same thing was given more than two times, count it a one. EXCEPT breast milk, which is different from Q42?There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity. Is khas ghantay main, kiya bachay ko ghar pe kuch paka k khanay ya peenay k liye diya giya. Jaisay k: Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer. Ager aik he cheez aik khas ghantay main aik se ziyda baar degaye hai, to usko aik ke baar ginti man laayen. Jo ka Q42 se mukhtalif ho Aaisa mumkin hai k maan ne bachay ko kuch aur bhe paka k diya h Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Where this recipe was made or cooked? Bachay ko khilay Janay wali cheez kahan tayar k gay th Own home (apna ghar ma) Somewhere else(ya Kahin aur)
Recipe name/description which was given to a baby during this specific hour? Us cheez ka naam jo paka k dee gaye
Code of the recipe used (Use codes from the manual) Uss cheez ka code jo paka k dee gaye(code manual s istmal kare)
Portion size description (Use terms as per manual. Like bottle, ml teaspoon, tablespoon etc) Kis cheez se wo cheez khilaye ya pilaaye gaye (jo manual m terms h wo user kare. Jese k bottle, teaspoon, tablespoon etc)
Amount used in gram Kitni Mikqaar main de gaye grams m likhy
During this specific hour, was baby given any other thing which was cooked at home (A recipe) For example , Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer, EXCEPT breast milk? If same thing was given more than two times, count it a one. EXCEPT breast milk, which is different from Q42 and Q48? There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity. Is khas ghantay main, kiya bachay ko ghar pe kuch paka k khanay ya peenay k liye diya giya. Jaisay k: Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer. Ager aik he cheez aik khas ghantay main aik se ziyda baar degaye hai, to usko aik ke baar ginti man laayen. Jo ka Q42 aur 48 se mukhtalif ho Aaisa mumkin hai k maan ne bachay ko kuch aur bhe paka k diya ho Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Where this recipe was made or cooked? Bachay ko khilay Janay wali cheez kahan tayar k gay th
Recipe name/description which was given to a baby during this specific hour? Us cheez ka naam jo paka k dee gaye
Code of the recipe used Uss cheez ka code jo paka k dee gay
Portion size description Kis cheez se wo cheez khilaye ya pilaaye gaye
Amount used in gram Kitni Mikqaar main de gaye
Was a specific food item e.g. goat milk, juice, banana, biscuit, Fruit juice, Formula milk, Ceralac etc used? If same thing given more than once in an hour, count it as one Kiya is khas ghantay main bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis ko pakana na parta ho, jaisay k Bakri ka doodh, formula milk, Joose, Kaila, Biscuit, Ceralac WAGAIRA.Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Name of food item which was given to the baby during this specific hour? Uss khanay ke cheez ka naam
Code of food item used Us khanay ke cheez ka code
Portion size description Kis size ya cheez se de gaye
Amount used in gram Kitni miqdaar de gaye
Was any other specific food item e.g. goat milk, juice, banana, biscuit, Fruit juice, Formula milk, Ceralac etc used? If same thing given more than once in an hour, count it as one. Should be different from Q59 Kiya is khas ghantay main bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis ko pakana na parta ho, jaisay k Bakri ka doodh, formula milk, Joose, Kaila, Biscuit, Ceralac WAGAIRA. Q59 se mikhtalif
There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity. Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Name of food item which was given to the baby during this specific hour? Uss khanay ke cheez ka naam
Code of food item used Us khanay ke cheez ka code
Portion size description Kis size ya cheez se de gaye
Amount used in gram Kitni miqdaar de gaye
Was any other specific food item e.g. goat milk, juice, banana, biscuit, Fruit juice, Formula milk, Ceralac etc used? If same thing given more than once in an hour, count it as one. Should be different from Q59 and Q64 Kiya is khas ghantay main bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis ko pakana na parta ho, jaisay k Bakri ka doodh, formula milk, Joose, Kaila, Biscuit, Ceralac WAGAIRA. Q59 se mikhtalif
There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity. Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Name of food item which was given to the baby during this specific hour? Uss khanay ke cheez ka naam
Code of food item used Us khanay ke cheez ka code
Portion size description Kis size ya cheez se de gaye
Amount used in gram Kitni miqdaar de gaye
Was the baby given any of these items (Non-food item) during this specific hour? Multiple answer allowed Kiya bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis main jo k Ghiza nah o, jaisay k paani, Ghutti, Gari Booti wagaira
Plain water sada pani
Sugar water Chini Wala Pani
Grip water Grip water
Kehwa extract Kehwa extract
Hookah water Hookah water
Ghutti Ghutti
Rose water or similar water gulab ka pani ya us jesa kuch
Any herbal water koi herbal pani
Honey/honey water shahid ya shahid wala pani
Other Koi or
Importance of Exclusive Breastfeeding
Breast milk provides all the food and water that your baby needs during the first 6 months. Maa k dhood bachay ko khuraq aur pani donoun faraham karta ha jitni bachay k zarorat hoti pehlay 6 mahinay tak
Do not give anything else, not even water, during your baby’s first 6 months. Pehlay 6 mahinay tak bachay ko maa k dhood k ilawa khuch aur nahi daina chahiya, yahan tak k pani bh nahi
Even during very hot weather, breast milk will satisfy your baby’s thirst. Shadeed garmi ma bh ma aka dhood bachay ko peeyas sa mehfooz rakhta ha
Giving your baby anything else will cause him/her to suckle less and will reduce the amount of breast milk that you produce. Agar maa bachay ko apnay dhood k illawa khuch aur day gee tu us sa aik tu bachy k maa ka dhood peenay k salahiyat kamzor paray gee and dosra maa ko dhood bh kaam ai ga
Water, other liquids and foods can make the baby sick. Pani, dosray mashroob and upper sa di hoi khorak app k bachay ko beemar kar day gee
You can give medicines if they are recommended by your health provider. Bachay ko agar doctor k mashwaray k baad koi deewai dainay k zarorat paray tu wo di ja sakti ha
Exclusive breastfeeding means feeding your baby ONLY breast milk for the first 6 months. Exclusive breastfeeding ka matlab hota ha zindagi k pehlay 6 mahinay tak bachay ko sirf aur sirf ma aka dhood pilana
Exclusive breastfeeding for the first 6 months protects your baby from many illnesses, such as diarrhoea and respiratory infections. Pehlay 6 mahinay tak bachay ko sirf aur sirf ma aka dhood pilanay sa bacha bhoot sari beemarioun sa mehfooz rehta ha maslan dasst aur sans k beemarian
Mixed feeding means feeding your baby both breast milk and any other foods or liquids, including infant formula, animal milks, or water. Mixed feeding ka matlab hota ha bachay ko maa k dhood k saath saath koi aur khoraq aur peenay k cheez maslan dabay ka dhood, gai/bakri ka dhood ya pani daina
Mixed feeding before 6 months can damage your baby’s stomach. 6 mahinay sa pehlay mixed feeding sa bachay k pait par bura asar par sakta ha
Mixed feeding increases the chances that your baby will suffer from illnesses such as diarrhoea and pneumonia, and from malnutrition. Bhoot mumkin ha mixed feeding sa bachay zayda beemar rahay and us ko pait k beemarian , namoonia ka khatra ho and wo ghazai kilaat ka shikar rahay
Giving your baby foods or any kind of liquids other than breast milk, including infant formula, animal milks, or water before 6 months can damage your baby’s stomach. This reduces the protection that exclusive breastfeeding gives, and all of the benefits that your baby gets from your breast milk. 6 mahinay sa pehlay bachay ko maa k dhood k ilawa koi aur cheez dainay sa bhoot mumkin ha bacha pait k beemarioun ma mubtila rahay. Dabay ka dhood, gai /bakri ka dhood bachay k quwat e meedafiyat ko kamzor kar daita ha, jis k waha sa bacha aksar beemar rehta ha. Ma aka dhood bachay ko bhoot c beemarioun sa mehfooz rakhta ha
Breastfeed on demand, both day and night (8 to 12 times) to build up your breast milk supply Bachay ko maa ka dhood din ma 8 to 12 dafa daina lazmi ha, us sa maa ko dhood bh wafer miqdar ma ai ga
Crying is a late sign of hunger. Early signs that your baby wants to breastfeed include: \na) Restlessness\nb) Opening mouth and turning head from side-to-side\nc) Putting tongue in and out\nd) Suckling on fingers and fists Bachay ka rona is baat k ilammat ha k bachay ko shadeed bhoot lagi ha. Behtar ha k bacha ko ronay sa pehlay hi maa k dhood milay, aur is surat ma bacha:\na) Baichan ho ga\nb) Apna moun kholay ga and apna sir idhar udhar goomai ga Moun sa zeban andar bahir karay gaApni unglian and kalaiyan choosay ga
Let your baby finish one breast before offering the other. Switching back and forth from one breast to the other prevents the baby from getting the nutritious ‘hind milk’. The ‘fore milk’ has more water and satisfies the baby’s thirst. The ‘hind milk’ has more fat and satisfies your baby’s hunger. Bachay ko pehlay aik taraf sa poora dhood peenay dain, jaldi jaldi bachay k side change karnay sa bachay ko sahi dhood nahi milay ga jis ko baad ka dhood bola jata ha and wo dhood ghazaiyat sa bharpoor hota ha and asal ma bachay k bhook ko wohi khatam karta ha. Pehlay ana wala dhood sirf pani hota ha jis sa sirf bachay k peeyas kahatam hoti ha
Do NOT use bottles, teats or spouted cups. They are difficult to clean and can cause your baby to become sick Dhood k botel, choosni and cups istimaal na karain. In cheezoun k safai ka khaas khayal rakhan parta ha and sahi safai na honay k soorat ma bacha beemar par sakta ha
If your baby is ill or sleepy, wake him or her to offer the breast often Agar app ka bacha beemar ha ya so raha ha, tu us ko muqar waqt utha ka maa apna dhood pilai
Key messages on good attachment
Good attachment helps to ensure that your baby suckles well and helps you to produce a good supply of breast milk. Bacha maa k saath sahi tarha joora rahay us sa bachay ko dhood peenay ma asani hoti ha and maa ko achi miqdar ma dhood ata ha
Good attachment helps to prevent sore and cracked nipples and ensures that Breastfeeding should not be painful. Is sa maa k breast ma soozish nahi hoti and nipples ma dard bh nahi hota
Get help to improve the attachment if you experience pain. Mahir sa rabta karain agar app ko kisi bh kisam ka dard mahsoos ho bachay ko dhood pilatay waqt
There are 4 signs of good attachment:\na) Baby’s mouth is wide open\nb) You can see more of the darker skin (areola) above the baby’s mouth than below\nc) Baby’s lower lip is turned outwards\nd) Baby’s chin is touching mother’s breast Achi tarhan munsaliq honay k chaar zaroroi niqaat:\na) Bachay ka moun achi tarhan khula ho\nb) Maa k breast ka jo gehra rung ka hissay ha wo bachay k moun k upper wali side sa zayda nazar ai ga nicchay wali side k muqabil\nc) Bachay k nichay ka hount bahir k janib moray ho ga\nd) Bachay k thoodi maa k breast ko touch karay gee
The signs of effective suckling are:\na) a) The baby takes slow deep suckles, sometimes pausing.\nb) You may be able to see or hear your baby swallowing after one or two suckles.\nc) Suckling is comfortable and pain free for you.\nd) Your baby finishes the feed, releases the breast and looks contented and relaxed.\ne) The breast is softer after the feed. Bacha sahi tarhan dhood pee raha ha us k zarori niqaat:\na) Bacha ruk ruk k dhood peeta ha\nb) Maa ko mahsoos ho ga k bacha aik ya do dafa choosnay k baad dhood andar lay kar jata ha\nc) Bacha jab dhood pee raha ho ga tu maa ko kisi bh kisam ka dard nahi ho ga\nd) Bacha jab pait bhar k dhood pee lay ga tu khudi sa peena chor day ga\ne) Dhood peelanay ka baad breast naram ho jay ga
Effective suckling helps you to produce milk and satisfy your baby Agar bacha sahi tareeqay sad hood piya ga tu maa ko acha and wafir miqdar ma dhood ai ga
After your baby releases one breast offer your baby the other breast. This will ensure that your baby stimulates your milk production in both breasts, and also gets the most nutritious and satisfying milk. Jab bacha aik side say dhood pee lay tu us ko dosri side sa dhood pilain. Is ma maa ko doun sidoun sa wafir miqdar ma dhood ai jis sa bachay k nashurma bh achi ho gee
Key messages on good Breastfeeding positions
Good positioning helps to ensure that your baby suckles well and helps you to produce a good supply of breast milk Bachay k sahi position dhood pilatay waqt is liya zarori ha takay bacha sahi tarhan dhood pee sakay and maa ko sahi miqdar ma dhood ai
The four key points about your baby’s position are: straight, facing the breast, close, and supported:\na) The baby’s body should be straight, not bent or twisted, but with the head slightly back.\nb) The baby’s body should be facing the breast, not held flat to your chest or stomach, and he or she should be able to look up into your face.\nc) The baby should be close to you.\nd) You should support the baby’s whole body, not just the neck and shoulders, with your hand and arm. Chaar zarori hidaayat app k bachay k position k hawalay sa: seedha, moun maa k seenay k taraf, maa k qareeb and sahi tarhan pakra howa\na) Bacha seedha honay chahiya, na jhooka howa na moora howa, and bachay ka sir thora sa pichay k taraf\nb) Bachay ka jisam thora sa upper k taraf ho takay us ka moun maa k seenay k qareeb ho, and bacha upper k taraf dheekay\nc) Bachay maa sa qareeb ho\nd) Bachay ko apnay haath and bazu k madad sa is tarhan pakray takay us k puray jisam ko sahara milay, khali garden aur kanday nahi
There are different ways to position your baby:\na) Cradle position (most commonly used)\nb) Cross cradle position (good for small babies)\nc) Side-lying position (use to rest while breastfeeding and at night)\nd) Under-arm position (use after caesarean section, if your nipples are painful or if you are breastfeeding twins or a small baby) Bachay ko pakarnay k mukhtalif tareeqay han:\na) Jhoolay wali position (Sab sa zayda kiya janay wala tareeqa))\nb) Cross ma jhoolay wali position (chootay size k bachoun k zayda acha tareeqa)\nc) Side pay lait k (Maa aram sa lait k bchay ko dhood pilai ya raat ma)\nd) Operation k baad, ya agar maa ko nipples ma dard ho, ya jorrwa bachay ho, ya bacha chota ho
Exclusive breastfeeding of low birth weight babies
Guide the mother about Skin-to-skin contact: Kangaroo mother care provides skin-to-skin contact, warmth and closeness to the mother’s Breast Maa ko batain k bachay ko apnay app sa joray rakhna kitna zarori ha, jis ko hum Kangaroo care kehtay han, is sa bacha garam rehta ha and apni maa sa qareeeb bh
Breast milk is especially adapted to the nutritional needs of low birth weight infants. Maa ko dhood un bachoun k liya bay hud faida mund ha jin ka pidaish k waqat wazan kaam hota ha
The best milk for a low birth weight infant, including babies born early, is the breast milk from the baby’s own mother Wo bachay jin ka pidaish k waqt wazan kaam ho, ya jo waqt sa pehlay paida ho jain un ko maa ka dhood hi sab sa zayda faida day ga
The cross cradle and underarm positions are good positions for feeding a low birth weight baby. Jhoolay wali position ya under arm position sab sa behtareen tareeqa ha un bachoun k liya jin ka pidaish k waqt wazan kaam hota ha
Breastfeed frequently to get baby use to the breast and to keep the milk flowing. Bachay ko zayda sa zayda maa ka dhood pilain takay bacha maa k dhood peenay ka adi ho jay and maa ko zayda sa zayda dhood ai
Long slow feeds are fine. It is important to keep the baby at the breast. Zayda dair tak thora thora dhood ana sahi ha, zayda aham yeh ha k bacha ma aka dhood peeya
If the baby sleeps for long periods of time, you may need to unwrap the baby or take off some of his or her clothes to help waken him or her for the feed. Agar bacha zayda dair tak sota ha tu maa ko chahiya k us ko dhood k time par jaga k dhood pilay chahay bachay ko neend sa jagana kyoun na paray
Breastfeed the baby before he or she starts to cry. Bacha ko ronay sa pehlay dhood peela daina chahiya
Earlier signs of hunger include a combination of the following: being alert and restless, opening mouth and turning head, putting tongue in and out, sucking on hand or fist Bacha ko jab bhook tu us k nishani hoti ha: Bacha baichan hog a, ana moun kholay ga and sir idhar udhar ghoomay ga, apni zeban moun sa andar bahir karay ga and apnay haath aur unglian choosay ga
Feeding the sick baby less than 6 months of age
Breastfeed more frequently during illness, including diarrhoea, to help the baby fight sickness, reduce weight loss and recover more quickly. Bachay ko beemari k doran zayda sa zayda dhood peelana chahiya takay wo beemari sa lar sakay, us k quwat e madafiyat bharay, and jo wazan us ka beemari sa kaam howa wo us ko kami ko poora karay
Breastfeeding also provides comfort to your sick baby. If your baby refuses to breastfeed, encourage your baby until he or she takes the breast again. Maa ka dhood peelanay sa beemar bachay aram sa rahay ga, aur agar bacha dhood na peeya tu phir bh maa ko chahiya k wo zabardasti maa ko apna dhood peelay
Give only breast milk and medicines recommended by your doctor/ health care provider. Agar bachay ko koi dewai daini tu kisi mahir doctor k mashwara k bagair nahi dainai chahiya
If the baby is too weak to suckle, express breast milk to give the baby. This will help you to keep up your milk supply and prevent breast difficulties. Agar bacha kamzor ha aur us ma maa ka dhood peenay k himaat nahi ho maa ko chahiya k haath sa dhood nikal k ussay pilai, is sa maa ko dhood ata rahay ga and breast ma koi masla bh nahi ho ga
After each illness, increase the frequency of breastfeeding to help your baby regain health and weight. Beemari k baad bachay ko maa apna dhood zayda sa zayda peelai takay bachay k sehat jaldi bahal ho jay
6. When you are sick, you can continue to breastfeed your baby. You may need extra food and support during this time. Agar maa khud beemar ha tu wo bachay ko phir bh apna dhood pila sakti ha, is surat ma maa ko chahiya k wo apni giza ka khayal rakhay
Was baby given a breastfeed during this specific hour? Kiya bachay ko is khas ghantay main ma aka doodh pilaya giya?
Ask the mother, how many times, did baby has a breastfeed, during this specific hour, like between 06:00 am to 07:00 am. If only one time, write 1, if two times, write 2 and so on Maa, se poochain k is khas ghnatay main bachay ko kitni baar doodh pilaya giya. Misaal k tor pe subah 6 se 7 k darmiyan bachay ko Maa k doodh pilaya giya, to kitni baar, aik baar ya Do baar, ya teen bar, jitni baar bhe pilaya giya, jama kar k likhain
Breast milk type Maa na bachay ko dhood pilaya ha tu kya wo Mother’s own (Maa ka apna tha) Someone else’s \nbachay ko kisi aur aurat na dhood pilaya ha
Side of breast used for breastfeeding at this specific time Jis muqarar waqt pay dhood pilaya ha us ma maa na kis side k breast sa dhood pilaya ha
Methods used for breastfeeding at this specific time Kis tarhan maa na bachay ko dhood pilaya ha Direct from breast (breast sa) Expressed the breast milk and given by cup and spoon(Dhood ko breast sa nikal k chamchay ya cup sa) Expressed the breast milk and given by bottle (Dhoodh ko breast sa nikal k and feeder bottle sa diya)
How often are you using this supplement since last visit? AAP kitni dafa yeh sacchet use karti ha tab sa aj tak jab hum pichli dafa ai thay Daily (rozana) Alternate days (har dosray din aik din chor kay) Stopped using it (istimaal karna chor diya)
System to copy date of last completely filled CRF5a
Number of days since last visit. To be calculated from Q27 and today’s date Kitnay din ho gay han pichli dafa sa ab tak, yeh tareekh Q27 ma likhi gay tareekh and aj k tareekh k hisab sa likhi jay gee
Total number of sachet supposed to be used by woman.System to calculate from Q28 multiply by 2 Sacchet k tadad jo LW ko istimaal karnay chahiya thay Yeh system khud calculate kar lay ga Q28 k tareekh k hisab sa and us ko 2 sa zarab day ga
Numbers of empty sachets returned by LW Khali sacchat k tadaad jo LW na wapis kiya
Total amount of sachet used by LW since last visit? Probe well Aik dafa phir LW sa pochain k kitnay saahet use kiya pichli dafa sa lay k ab tak
Amount of sachet which were used by someone else at home or outside the home since? Probe well Sacchat k taadad jo kisi aur na istimaal kiya ghar ma ya ghar ma sa bahir kisi na
Compliance in % - System to calculate as, Value in Q31 divided by value in Q29 multiply by 100 Compliance k % Yeh system khudi calculate kar k likh day ga Q29 and Q31 ma dali gay entries k hisab sa
Based on Q32, was Maamta shared by any anyone else? Kya Maamta sachet kisi aur nab h istimaal kiya
Whom did the woman share the Maamta sachet with? LW na diya gay sachet kis k saath mil k istimaal kiya
Enrolled baby wo bacha jo study ma shamil ha
Other siblings of enrolled baby Bachay k dosray behan bhai
Other children at home Dosray bachay ghar k
Other lactating woman at home koi aur dhood pilanay wali maa
Other pregnant woman at home koi aur haamla aurat ghar ma
Male family member ghar ka koi mard
Neighbours mohalaydar
Did you notice any side effects of Maamta since last visit? Maamta sachet sa koi bh gair zarori side effect ya aalamat zahir hoi
If yes, what was/were the side effects? Agar howa tu wo kya tha
Diarrhea Dast
Vomiting ultian
Abdominal pain pait ma dard
Rashes jisam pay laal nishan
What was/were the reasons of not using the supplement? Agar LW na supplement use nahi kiya tu us ka reason kya tha
Taste is not good/bad taste zaiqa acha nahi ha
It causes diarrhoea khana k baad motion hota ha
It causes vomiting khanay k baad ulti ati ha
It causes abdominal pain khanay k baad pait ma dard hoti ha
It causes rashes jisam pay laal nishan ho jatay hana
Other illness koi aur masla
Forget to take it bhool jati ha
Finished before time time sa pehlay sachet khatam ho gay thay
Went somewhere kahin chali gay th and sachet pas nahi thay
Not Applicable ghair zarori (Orat shashey kha rahi h )
Other(Specify) koi aur
Number of new sachets given today by health worker? \n Write 99 if LW refused to take. Alert for supervisor Aj team member na kitnay sachet LW ko diya us k tadad likhain \n Supervisor ko inform karain agar LW na sachet lainay sa inkar kar diya ha tu
Is this 42 day visit? Bachay ko visit 42 day pay k gay
Is LW enrolled in Maamta + Azithromycin Arm C LW ka indiraj Arm C ma howa na
Is the child available Bacha khud moujod ha
Ask the mother if the child received any powder medicine (antibiotic suspension or injection) in the last 7 days Maa sa pochain k kya bachay ko pichlay 7 din ma aisi koi deewai di gay ha jo k powder k shakal ma ho ya koi aisi deewai infection kaam karnay k liya
Any prescription or wrapper of medicines which is available Agar koi deewai di ha tu us k khali daba ya khali bottle moujoud ha
Name of medicines Di gay deewaiyoun k naam likhain aik aik kar k
Ask mother or family, if they remember the name of medicine Maa ya ghar ma kisi aur afrad ko deewaiyoun ka naam yaad han
Name of medicine if known Deewaiyoun k naam jo koi aur batay ga
For how long were these medicine used? Kitnay din tak yeh deewaiyan istimaal ki gay han
Are these medicines still being used Kya abhi tak yeh deewaioun istimaal k ja rahi han
Consult with supervisor and discuss if any suspected medicine is Azithromycin Supervisor sa rabta karain and confirm karain k in ma sa koi bh deewai Azithromycin tu nahi ha
Consulted and confirmed by supervisor that no Azithromycin or any other antibiotic was given to the child\nSupervisor k mashwaray k baad confirm kar liya k di gay deewaiyoun ma sa koi bh Azithromycin ya koi aur antibiotic nahi ha
Consulted and confirmed that Azthirthomycin was given in the past few days\nSupervisor k mashwaray k baad confirm kar liya k di gay deewai Azithromycin hi th jo k pichaly khuch din ma bachay ko di gay ha
Consulted and confirmed that Azthirthomycin was given in the past few days Supervisor k mashwaray k baad confirm kar liya k di gay deewai Azithromycin hi th jo k pichaly khuch din ma bachay ko di gay ha
Decided to be administered the dose today \nAj k tareekh ma bachay ko AZ ka dose day diya jay ga
Dose of Azithromycin in on hold for next seven \n AZ ka dose 7 din baad diya jay ga bachay ko
Date when a supervisor communicated to administer the dose to the child Wo tareekh likhain jis din supervisor na bola ha k bachay ko AZ daini ha
Inform and counsel the mother about Azithromycin Maa ko bata diya AZ k baray ma
Weight of the child Bachay ka wazan
Dose in Milligram AZ ka dose mg ma
Dose in ml AZ ka dose ml ma
Dose filled in the measuring oral syringe and administered? AZ k dose syrings ma bhar k bachay ko moun sa pila diya gaya
Remaining amount of Azithromycin archived with the Study ID Jo AZ k miqdar bottle ma bach gay us ko study ID k saath mehfooz kar liya gaya
Key messages
Maamta product is balance protein and energy supplement for lactating women. Maamta sachet aik protein based balanced energy supplement ha jo khaas tor pay dhood pilanay wali maoun k liya ha
Before use, try to press sealed sachet slowly with your fingers to soften this paste Istimaal sa pehaly sachet ko haath sa achi tarhan daba k andar mojoud paste ko naram kar lain
Taste of product is sweet in nature, but consider it as a special product only design for lactating women. Andar mojoud paste ka zaiqa thora sa meetha ha, jo k sirf aur sirf dhoodh pilanay wali maoun k liya banaya gaya ha
After eating this product, you may have improved breast milk to feed your child. Is ko khanay k baad, Maa k dhood ma izafa ho ga takay app apnay bachay ko acha dhood pila sakain
It will only benefit, when you consume 2 complete sachets in a day for next 6 months and exclusively breastfeed your child. Is ka zayda faida tab ho ga jab app 2 sacchets 1 din ma musalsal 6 mahinay tak istimaal karain and saath ma bachay ko sirf aur sirf ma aka dhood pilain
Maamta product is designed only for lactating women, it may cause side effects if children and other adult member will use it. Yeh product sirf aur sirf dhood pilanay wali maoun k liya banai gay ha, bachay ya kisi aur ko khilanay k surat ma koi bh muzir asraat ho saktay han
Do not share Maamta with anyone in the family, even in a small quantity App ko jo sachet diya gaya ha us ko ghar ma kisi ko aur istimaal na karnay dain
You can eat Maamta directly from the sachet and save the remaining amount in a covered utensil or you may completely pour the sachet in a plate and eat it with spoon. Do not forget to cover the plate if amount is left over. App Maamta sachet rookha bh kha sakti han, ya plate ma nikal k chamchay sa bh. Agar istimal k baad thori miqdar sacchay ma bach jay tu sachet ko bund kar k rakh lain ya phir plate ko dhak k rakhain
If you develop any type of rash, diarrhea, vomiting or any other unusual sign and symptoms, please immediately contact us Agar maamta khanay k baad app ko kisi bh kisam ka masla ho maslan pait kharab, ulti, jisam pay laal nishan ana, tu foran hum sa rabta karain
Unused portion of Maamta sachet should be consumed within a day and save the empty sachet in a bag provided to you Maamta sachay kholnay k baad aik din k andar andar istimaal kar laina chahiya, and istimal k baad khali sachet ko sambhal k rakahin appnay pass
Our team will provide you 14 days supply, which you have to consume according to instructions Hamari team app ko 14 din k sachet faraham karay gee jo k app na di gay hidayaat k mutabiq istimal karna ha
Empty sachet will be collected by the team Yaad rahay k khali sachet hamari team app sa jama karay gee tu un ko hifazat sa rakahin
Has LW eaten anything between this specific hours (For example, between 06:00 am to 07:00 am? Kya LW ma pichaly 24 ghantoun ma khuch khaya ha?
Did Woman consume any cooked food or recipe during this hour? (For example Roti, Chawal, Daal k Salan. There is a great possibility that LW used two different recipes together, like route with some Salan, Rich with Daal, you need to mention both separately i.e. separate entry for both. Kya LW na koi paki hoi cheez ya paka howa khana khaya ha?
Where this was made? Jo LW na khaya ha wo kahan tayyar howa tha?
Own home\napnay ghar ma
Somewhere else\nKahin aur paka tha
Recipe description which was consumed to a LW during this specific hour?\nStaff to write the name of the recipe, Like Daal ka Salan, Roti, Paratha etc.\nWrite single recipe name Jo LW na khaya ha us k pakanay k tarqeeb apna pass likhain\nRecipe ka naam likhain masla daal ka salan, roti, partha etc\nAik dafa ma aik cheez ka naam likhain
Code of the recipe used Us receipe ka code manual ma sa dhek k likhain
Portion size description If same item was consumed within same our, count it as one item Jo LW na khaya ha us ka size kya tha Agar aik he cheez iss ghantay main aik se ziyada baar khaye hai to aik he ginti mai shamil Karen
Amount used in gram If same item was consumed within same hour, count it as one item Agar aik he cheez iss ghantay main aik se ziyada baar khaye hai to aik he ginti mai shamil karen Miqdar ko grams ma likhain
Did Woman consume any other cooked food or recipe during this hour? (For example Roti, Chawal, Daal k Salan. There is a great possibility that LW used two different recipes together, like route with some Salan, Rich with Daal, you need to mention both separately i.e. separate entry for both. Kya LW na koi paki hoi cheez ya paka howa khana khaya ha?
Where this was made? Jo LW na khaya ha wo kahan tayyar howa tha?
Own home\napnay ghar ma
Somewhere else\nKahin aur paka tha
Recipe description which was consumed to a LW during this specific hour? Jo LW na khaya ha us k pakanay k tarqeeb apna pass likhain
Code of the recipe used Us receipe ka code manual ma sa dhek k likhain
Portion size description If same item was consumed within same our, count it as one item Jo LW na khaya ha us ka size kya tha Agar aik he cheez iss ghantay main aik se ziyada baar khaye hai to aik he ginti mai shamil Karen
Amount used in gram If same item was consumed within same our, count it as one item Agar aik he cheez iss ghantay main aik se ziyada baar khaye hai to aik he ginti mai shamil karen Miqdar ko grams ma likhain
Is there any food item which was consumed by the LW during this specific hour? Like Banana, Apple, Juice, Milk, Salad, Biscuit There may be chance LW used salad, which contains multiple items mix with each other, you need to enter all the things separately Koi aur khanay k cheez jo LW na khai ha pichay 24 ghantoun ma Ho sakta ha LW na koi salad ya aisi cheez jis ma bhoot sari cheezain mix houn, wo sari cheezain jo us na khai han sab k alag alag entry karain
Name of food item Jo cheez LW na khai ha us k naam likhain
Code of food item used Us khanay k cheez ka code likhain
Portion size description Jo LW na khaya ha us ka size kya tha
Amount used in gram Miqdar likhain grams ma
Is there any other food item which was consumed? Like Banana, Apple, Juice, Milk, Salad, Biscuit There may be chance LW used salad, which contains multiple items mix with each other, you need to enter all the things separately Koi aur khanay k cheez jo LW na khai ha pichay 24 ghantoun ma
Name of food item Jo cheez LW na khai ha us k naam likhain
Code of food item used Us khanay k cheez ka code likhain
Portion size description Jo LW na khaya ha us ka size kya tha
Amount used in gram Midair likhain grams MA
Does woman consume Gutka usually? Kiya khatoon Gutka khati hain
Does woman consume Pan usually? Kiya Khatoon Pan khati hain
Does woman consume cigarette usually? Kiya khatoon cigarette peeti hain
Does woman consume chewed tobacco usually? Kiya khatoon Tambakoo khati hain
Does woman consume cannabis usually? Kiya Khatoon Bhang peeti hain
Does woman consume Hashish or Charas? kya khatoon Charas peeti h
Does woman consume Herion? kya khatoon Herion peeti h
Does woman consume Huqqa? kya khatoon Huqqa peeti h
Any other substance abuse? kya khatoon or koi nasha karti h
Since last visit by Newborn team, was baby had any danger sign, complication, problem or disease for which he or she was taken to any health facility or self treatment given? Pichli dafa sa lay kar ab tak jab new born team na visit kiya tha tu kya bachay ko khatray k koi aalmaat zahir hoi, ya us ko kisi aur maslay k waja sa ilaj k liya hospital jana para ya khud sa kisi na us ka ilaj kiya?
Which danger sign, complication, problem or disease, has the baby had? Which danger sign, complication, problem or disease, has the baby had?
Difficulty in feeding Dhood peenay ma duhswari
Cough Khaansi
Cold/Flu/Runny nose Nazla ya behta howa naak
Difficulty in breathing /Fast respiratory rate Sanns ma masla ya/taiz taiz sans ana
Convulsions Jhatkay ana
Fever Bhukar
Hypothermia Jisam thanda par jana
Lethargy or no movement Thakan ya koi harkat na hona
Pustules Phoray ka phinsian hona
Jaundice Yarkan/peelia
Umbilical redness or discharge Naaf wali jaga par laal nishan ya wahan sa khuch nikalna
Vomiting Ultian ana
Diarrhea Dast
Oral Thrush Moun aur zeban par zakham hona
Irritability or too much crying Chircharapan ya bhoot zayda rona
Redness of eyes or watery discharge Ankhain laal hona ya ankhoun sa pani ana
Grunting Gargarana
Lips / tongue turning blue or black Zeban aur hount kalay ya neelay ho jana
Peripheral cyanosis Haat ya paoun neelay par jana
Bleeding from nose Naak sa khoon ana
Constipation Qabz hona
Dysentery Paichish
Urine stopped Peeshap ruk jana
Ear discharge or pus Kaan sa pus nikalna
Chest congestion Seenay ma jagran
Other (specify) Koi aur masla
Since last visit by Newborn team, was baby been taken to any health facility for care by family OR self treated? Pichli visit sa lay kar ab tak kya bachay ko kisi hospital ya sehat k markaz lay kar jana para, ya khud sa ghar ma us ka ilaj kiya gaya ho
From where was the care was sought? Kis sehat k markaz ya hospital lay kar gay bachay ko
Vital Pakistan/ Aga Khan Center
Attiya hospital
Koohi Goth Hospital
Jinnah
Civil
Korangi-5 government hospital
Any other government hospital
Private hospital
Clinic
Rural Health center
Dispensary
Medical store
Self medication
Did the baby receive any treatment during this period? Bachay ko koi deewai ya ilaj diya gaya is doran
What treatment was the given? Kon sa ilaj bachay ko diya gaya
Kept in an incubator Bachay ko machine ma rakha
Injectable antibiotics were administered Deewai di gay teekay k zariya
Antibiotic syrup was given Deewai di gay moun k zariya
Drip was administered Drip lagay gay
Oxygen was given through bag, tube or mask Oxygen lagi nali ya bag k zariya
Kept on a ventilator Sans wali machine lagay gay
Baby was kept on NG feed Bachay ko khorak k nali lagay gay
Some other medicine – not powdered one Koi aur deewai di gay, powder wali deewai k ilawa
Other (specify) Koi aur ilaj
Any prescription or bottle or wrapper of medicine/s, which is available? Bachay ko di gay deewai ya khali daba, ya khali bottle moujod ha
Please mention the name of all medicine Sari deewaioun k naam aik aik kar k likhain
Does anyone in the mother/family remembers the name of medicine/s the name of medicine which was prescribed? Maa ya ghar k kisi dosray afrad ko bachay ko di gay deewaioun ka naam yaad han
Please mention the name of all medicines which were recalled by mother/family? Wo naam aik aik kar k yahan likhain
Are the medicines still being continued untill now? Bachay ko di gay deewaiyan abhi bh istimaal ho rahi ha
If powder medications were prescribed, for how many days were these given? Agar bachay ko koi bh powder wali deewai di gay th tu wo kitnay din tak istimaal k gay
If baby was admitted during this period, for how long was the baby admitted?\n99 if do not know\n88 if unnecessary\n77 if not admitted Agar bacha is doran hosptial ma dhakil howa tu kitnay dinoun k liya
What is the state of the baby’s health according to the family? Is waqt bachay k sehat kaisi ha Well baby (Bacha sehatmand h) Recovered from illness (beemari dur ho gai h) Still ill, but better than before (abhi bh beemar ha laikin pehlay sa behtar ha) Condition has deteriorated (tabiyat aur kharab ho gay)
Respiratory rate (000 if refused)If the respiratory rate is 60 or more (if age is 59 days of less) OR 50 or more (if age is greater than 59 days), count again and note the second respiratory rate Sans lainay k raftar note karain Agar sans lainay k raftar 60 ya zayda ha tu aik daf phir note kar k likhain
Is the respiratory rate 60 or above on two different readings (if Age is less than 59 days?\nIs the respiratory rate 50 or above on two different readings (if Age greater than 59 days? Uper liya janay wali sans lainay k raftar 60 ya us sa zayda ha 2 dafa ma (Agar bachay k umer 59 dinoun sa kaam ha)\nUper liya janay wali sans lainay k raftar 50 ya us sa zayda ha 2 dafa ma (Agar bachay k umer 59 dinoun sa zayda ha)
Severe chest indrawing – Is chest indrawing on every breath? Shadeed sinay k harkat andar k taraf jab bacha sans laita ha
Is temperature on two different readings equal or greater than 38.0 Upper li gay doun readings 38.0 ya us sa zayda han
Is temperature on two different readings is less than 35.5 Upper li gay doun readings 35.5 sa kaam han
Check the movement of the baby Bachay ki harkat check karain Normal movement (sahi harkat ha) Movement only on stimulation (sirf chairnay par harkat ha) No movement at all or unconscious (koi harkat nahi and bacha hosh ma nahi)
Convulsions Jhatkay According to the family, the baby had convulsions\n(bachay ko jhatkay partay han) The baby had convulsions in your (health worker’s) presence\n(Bachay ko jhatkay ain han team k mojodgi ma) No convulsions\nKoi jhatkay nahi
Ask the mother if the baby is having problem in taking milk? Maa sa pochain k agar bachay ko maa ka dhood peenay ma koi masla tu darpaish nahi ho raha Mother has told that the baby has difficulty in breastfeeding\nMaa na bataya k bachay ko dhood peenay ma masla ha No problem with breastfeeding\nMaa ka dhood peenay ma koi masla nahi Baby unable to feed due to illness\nBacha beemari k waja sa dhood nahi pee sak raha Refused for assessment (Revisit)\nAssessment k liya mana kar diya
Ask the mother to feed the baby now and you (health worker) will observe Maa ko bolain k wo bachay ko app ka samnay dhood pilai and nichay di gay bataoun ko note karain
Has breastfeeding position been corrected by research staff? Bacha k position kya team member na sahi k
Has breastfeeding attachment been corrected by research staff? Bacha ko maa k saath joray rakha kya team member na sahi kiya
Does the baby have poor sucking or poor feeding or both due to illness? Bachay k dhood peenay k salahiyat kaam ha beemarik waja sa
Is the baby unable to feed? Bacha bilkul dhood nahi pee saka
Any pustules on the skin? Bachay k jisam par kisi kisam k chalay ya phinsian han
Umbilical redness or discharge of pus? Naaf ma soojan ya waha sa kisi cheez ka nikalna None Redness is present (Jaga par soojan ha) Discharge of pus (Pus nikal rahi ha) Both
Jaundice Peeliya / Yarkan No jaundice (Nahi ha) Mild jaundice (halka ha) Moderate jaundice (Darmiyana ha) Severe jaundice (Shadeed ha)
Did the health worker find any symptom, condition or problem with the baby? Team member na in ma koi masla bachay ka noima kartay howa note kiya
Cough Khansi
Cold/Flu/Runny nose Nazla ya naak behna
Vomiting ultian
Diarrhea Dast
Oral thrush Moun aur zeban par zakham hona
Irritability / excessive crying Chichirahat ya bhoot zayda rona
Redness of eyes or discharge of water ankhain laal hona ya ankhoun sa pani nikalna
Lips / tongue turning blue or blackish Hount ya zeban neeli ya kali hona
Tips of finger/Feet turn blue haatoun k unglian ya pair neelay hona
Some sounds present during respiration sans laitay howy awaz nikalna
Bleeding from nose Naak sa khoon ana
Pus in ear Kaan sa pus ana
Chest congestion seena jagra hona
Allergy / rash jisam par laal nishan hona
Constipation Qabz
Other (specify) koi aur masla
According to the health worker, does the baby have any severe symptom for which immediate referral is needed or has been referred? Team member k mutabiq bachay ko koi aisa masla ha jis k waja sa bachay ko foran tibbi maoinay k liya lay kar jana chahiya
Does the mother/family want a referral for their own satisfaction? Bachay k maa apni tasali k liya khud lay kar jana chahti ha bachay ko
Did the health worker refer the baby based on the mother’s/ family’s concern or for her own satisfaction? Team meber na bachay ko tibbi noimay k liya bhejwa diya
Did the parent/family of the baby accept the referral?\n(if the parent/family did not accept the referral, revisit the next day and guide) Bachay k ghar waloun na is ka qabool kar liya\nAgar bachay k ghar waloun nahi maan rahay tu dobara un k ghar jain dosray din and un k mazeed rehnumai karain
Reason for refusing the referral? Mana karnay ka reason kya tha
Did not think the baby was sick enough to need health care Un k mutabiq bacha itna beemar nahi ha k us ko sehat k markaz jana paray
No one available to go with the caregiver Koi moujod nahi ha jo bachay k saath ja sakay
Too much time from her regular duties Masroofiyat k waja sa
Someone else has to decide Koi aur is baat ka faisla karay ga
Too far to travel Bhoot dur jana parta ha
No transportation available Kisi gari ka bandobast nahi ha
Cost (transport, health care, other) Paisoun ka masla ha
Not satisfied with the available health care Maoujooda sehat k nizam tasali baksh nahi ha
Problem requires traditional care Bachay ko jo masla ha wo riwayti tareeqay sa theek ho jay ga
Thought baby was too sick to travel Bacha bhoot beemar ha and dur nahi ja sakta
Thought baby will die no matter what Bacha akhir kar mar jay ga khuch bh ho jay
Other (specify) Koi aur masla
Is this day 13 follow-up visit? Kya ya follow up ka 13th din ha
Is this day 46 visit? Follow up day 46 ko ha
Is this day 74 visit? Follow up din 74 ko ha
